M

Matrix - Class in app.matrice
Matrix is a class that impelment the most used operation of matrix :
- ADD,SUB by using the static method Matrix.operation()
- Multiplication by using the static method Matrix.mul()
- Diterminant by using det()
- Transpose by using the static method Matrix.transpose()
- Comatrice by using coMat()
- Inverse by using Inverse()
- Rank by using rank()
- Echelonne form by using echelonner() , lowerEchelonner() and echelonnerReduced()
Matrix(int, int) - Constructor for class app.matrice.Matrix
Construc a random(-100~x~100) martix
Matrix() - Constructor for class app.matrice.Matrix
Create a matrix from the user
Matrix(List<List<Fraction>>) - Constructor for class app.matrice.Matrix
Create a matrix from a other matrix
minMat(int, int) - Method in class app.matrice.Matrix
Give the mineur of matrix : omit row iOrg and omit column jOrg
mul(double) - Method in class app.function.intervale.BaseInterval
 
mul(Matrix, Matrix) - Static method in class app.matrice.Matrix
Do the multiplication of two matrix (m1 and m2)
mul(Matrix, Fraction) - Static method in class app.matrice.Matrix
Do the multiplication of a matrix and a number
mul(Fraction, Fraction) - Static method in class dep.fraction.Fraction
Do the multiplication of two fractions
Example of use :Fraction.mul(f1,f2)
mul(int) - Method in class dep.fraction.Fraction
Do the multiplication between a fraction and a constant
